Class ClosureOfAMethodName

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.closures.Closure

public class ClosureOfAMethodName
extends Closure

Whenever this call(Object...) is invoked, it reflectively invokes the methodName into the first argument passed, passing the rest of the arguments to the actual method.
